G'Day

I am completely new to SVG (today), but stumbled across the Pom downunder's example of using your dll to render a button in an href.
That all works fine for me, but what I would really like to do is use an SVG image on an image button (or as the background of a .Net button).
Is this meant to work? If not is it something you plan to do?

Adding an ImageButton with ImageUrl set to an svg image causes justÂ the bottom right corner of the image to appear.

Cheers

Rob
